entry.title: How to create a business partner of category group in public cloud
entry.content:
Hello, when creating a business partner in the public cloud using the Manage Business Partner Master Data app (F3163), I only have the options "Organization" and "Person", not "Group". How can I enable groups? I can create a group in the Maintain Business Partner app, but this is declared as an unknown object in F3163 and cannot be processed further.

System: Public Cloud 2508
best regars
Tobias

entry.title: SAP S/4 Hana Public Cloud Service Order : Billing for complete Confirmation
entry.content:
Hi,

We have the following scenario:

A service order is created with multiple service items. Each day, several service confirmation items are created and marked as Completed (but not Final confirmation). At month-end, these completed confirmation items need to be invoiced.

Currently, the system only allows invoice generation when the service order status is set completed or service item status is completed or when a confirmation item is flagged as Final confirmation.

Is there any configuration or process that would allow billing of completed confirmation items regardless of whether the service item is completed or the confirmation item is marked as final?

Thank you.

entry.title: #CoE#GB Work Agreement Template Uloading and PR Approval Question in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts,
I would like to ask three questions of SAP Public Cloud.
1. Is there a standard template available for uploading work agreements in "Manage Workforce" app?
2. Where can I view the modification history(log) for CDS Views?
3. Can an administrator manually assign an approval substitute or designate who should approve a specific document(PR)?
Thank you!

entry.title: Header Condition in RFQ & Quotation - SAP Public Cloud 2508
entry.content: I am using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508, and I am unable to see RFQ- and quotation-based header conditions. Please confirm whether this functionality is available in this release.

entry.title: Token Refreshes on Outbound OAuth 2.0 Client Settings (SAP Public Cloud)
entry.content:
How do we configure our ABAP CLOUD communication systems & communication to automatically manage token refreshes?

We have configured our Communication system to use a keycloak based token provider. On initial use, the SAP communication system/arrangement automatically fetches a valid token from our token endpoint. After some time, the token expires and our communication arrangement continues to use the expired token. 

A manual workaround I found is to go into the communication arrangement, adjust some property & save. This invalidates the initial token and SAP fetches a new valid token from our Token Endpoint.

How can we automate this the token refresh? Our API already returns a 401 status and header www-authenticate: Bearer realm="SkipumAPI", error="invalid_token"

 

__PRESENT

entry.title: Generation of customer-specific HU numbers as a contract manufacturer
entry.content:
Hello,

our customer is a manufacturer of its own products, but also a contract manufacturer for other companies. HU numbers and SSCC labels are used for pallets throughout the entire warehouse process.

A number range has been set up for the HU numbers, and this is fine for our client's own products.

However, certain customers for whom our client acts as a contract manufacturer have specific requirements for both the pallet labels and the HU numbers. These must be structured as follows:

Digit 1 = 3
Positions 2-8 = ILN
Positions 9-12 = Manufacturer number = 0008
Positions 13-17 = Freely selectable sequential number
Position 18 = Check digit according to GS1

Another customer for whom our customer acts as a contract manufacturer has similar requirements.

We do not yet have an approach for implementing the requirements in the public cloud and are therefore hoping for a solution or tips.

entry.title: SALES SERVICE
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I would like to understand the service sales process in SAP and would appreciate your guidance on the following points:

  1. What is the end-to-end service sales process flow in SAP?

  2. Is it possible to create a service sales order without using a service material master? If yes, what are the prerequisites or limitations?

Additionally, in the case of material sales, when goods are issued to the customer, the cost of the material is posted to the COGS GL account. However, for service sales:

  • How is the cost of sales calculated?

  • How is the corresponding GL account determined for service-related costs?

Could you please explain the overall process flow for service sales, including cost determination and accounting postings?

Looking forward to your valuable inputs.

Best Regards,
Dinesh

entry.title: Settlement Rule Configuration Issue for Overhead Project (1NT Test Script) - Receiver Category PSG N
entry.content:
Title: Settlement Rule Configuration Issue for Overhead Project (1NT Test Script) - Receiver Category PSG Not Allowed

Hello SAP Community,

I am currently working through the 1NT test script for SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition and encountered an issue with settlement rule configuration for an overhead project.

**Situation:**
- Following the 1NT test script section "1.1 Register Project"
- Project created successfully with Project Profile: "Overhead Project (間接費プロジェクト)"
- Settlement Profile assigned: YPSOVH (PS Settlement Overhead Project)

**Issue:**
When attempting to update the settlement rule with Receiver Category "PSG" (Profitability Segment) as instructed in the test script, I receive the following error:

> "Receiver categ. PSG is not allowed by settlement prof. YPSOVH for this"

**Configuration Check (Activity 105768):**
- In settlement profile YPSOVH, the "Profit. Segment" receiver category is set to "Settlement Not Allowed" and appears grayed out (cannot be changed)
- Other receiver categories like G/L Account, Cost Center, and WBS Element are set to "Settlement Optional"

**Questions:**
1. Is PSG (Profitability Segment) typically not allowed as a receiver for overhead projects?
2. Should the test script be using a different receiver category for overhead projects?
3. If PSG should be allowed, what configuration steps am I missing to enable it?
4. How should I proceed with the 1NT test script in this situation?

**Test Script Reference:**
The test script states:
> "Update settlement rule for project (applicable only for projects with revenue)
> Category: PSG"

This makes me wonder if the test script example using "overhead project" is appropriate for PSG settlement, or if there's a configuration prerequisite I'm missing.

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated!

**Environment:** SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition
**Configuration Activity:** 105768
**Settlement Profile:** YPSOVH

entry.title: Mass Download of Balance Confirmations
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community experts,

In S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, you have Customer Balance Confirmations/Supplier Balance Confirmations functions. 
You generate balance confirmations via "Schedule Accounts Receivable Jobs", and you download PDF files via "Manage Balance Confirmations". 
In order to download generated files, you have to open PDF previews individually. 

However, some users want to download multiple Balance Confirmations simultaneously.

Is there any way to download multiple Balance Confirmations?
I appreciate if you share your idea.

Best regards,
Tomoyoshi

entry.title: BADI MMIM_ITEM_PROVIDE_DATA doesn't get triggered during SES creation
entry.content:
Dear all,

After the SES creation via Manage Service Entry Sheets - Lean Services is approved, Material Document will be created.

The form output is expected to be displayed in Post Goods Movement App (Output tab) using the generated Material Document. I'm using data source FDP_GR4PO_COL_SLIP_SRV for the Form output.

I have created some additional custom fields for data source FDP_GR4PO_COL_SLIP_SRV (they are visible in the data source extension), used custom logic MMIM_ITEM_PROVIDE_DATA to populate their values. However, after SES creation and approval and material document is created, the custom fields values are not populated, its displaying blank value in form data XML. Using custom logic trace, the BADI seems not triggered in this scenario.

Can anyone tell me which BADI else can be used to add the custom fields into this data source for this scenario?

Note: I have checked the data source extension, the available pre-delivered fields are not sufficient, thus I'm creating the new custom fields.

entry.title: workflow for custom business object
entry.content:

If yes, how to connect the workflow to custom business object?

Thanks a lot.

entry.title: ACCESS FOR CREATING PURCHASE REQUISITION
entry.content:
Hello,

I am creating a business role On SAP public Cloud that allows users to create purchase requisitions. I have assigned the following business catalogs to the role: SAP_MM_BC_PURCH_DOC_DSP_PC, SAP_PS_BC_PROJ_FIN_ANLYTC_MC, and SAP_MM_BC_PR_MANAGE_PC.

However, users still encounter the error “Missing authorization: PReq Create: Doc. Type” when attempting to create a requisition. My intention is to keep the role limited to core access only.

Please advise which additional business catalog is required to resolve this authorization issue.

Thank you.

entry.title: Regarding to Manager of Last Approver of Supplier Invoice Workflow
entry.content:
Dear All.

I defined a workflow in the “Manage Workflows of Supplier Invoices” application.
I selected “Manager of Last Approver” as the approver.
However, when I performed the posting Supplier Invoice, it resulted in an error and the approver was not selected.
I thought the approver would be selected from the users entered as the manager of the data posting person in “Manage Workforce.” Is that incorrect?
If it is incorrect, please tell me where the approver is selected from. If it is correct, please explain why an error occurred this time.

Best Regards

entry.title: Cannot change Revenue Recognition Key to SPFCSC for Customer Project
entry.content:
Hello,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and would like to activate/use the revenue recognition key SPFCSC for a customer project with a fixed price contract.

However, we are not able to change the Revenue Recognition Key to SPFCSC in our system

Could you please advise:

  1. Under which prerequisites and configuration settings the Revenue Recognition Key can be changed for a project/contract item (e.g., before billing, before revenue recognition run, before any postings, etc.)?

  2. What is the recommended procedure to switch an existing project from another key (e.g., SPFC) to SPFCSC:

    • Is it supported to change the key for an ongoing project?

    • If not supported, should we create a new project/contract item and transfer scope, or reverse/cancel postings first?

  3. Which specific Fiori app(s) and CBC (SSCUI) configuration objects should be checked to enable SPFCSC assignment?

 

Title

Event-Based Revenue Recognition - Projects

 

Fiori ID

F4767 

 

Component

CO-PC-OBJ-EBR

entry.title: How to Set Billing Condition Type PCIP to Use Fixed Currency (eg: USD) in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Example scenario:

In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, is it possible to set the billing document price condition PCIP with a fixed currency (USD)?

The finance team always uses USD as the calculation currency. When the billing document currency changes, discrepancies occur due to exchange rate conversion.

But in the billing document the document currency is EUR.
We would like the condition to be calculated in USD and then converted correctly to the billing/document currency.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
